scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache out && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME && echo "blog.mies.co" >> out/CNAME && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy.basic: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
